analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi
sani dassana ttika a rūpa avacara duka

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ arūpāvacaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho naarūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham arūpāvacaram dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ na arūpāvacaraḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cha adhipatiyā cha pe avigate cha

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ naarūpāvacaraṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nasanidassanasappaṭigho nanaarūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham na arūpāvacaram dhammam paccayā na sanidassana sappaṭighaḥ na na arūpāvacaraḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
